title: Plakat Schriften - 1960s type specimen catalog- pictures + wood type catalog
content:
Hi,  
I just posted pictures of some type specimen catalogs in the “off our shelves ” section in my blog. Besides Plakat Schriften, I posted a really cool Wood type specimen catalog.

[http://grainedit.com/category/off-our-shelves/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081102221923/http:/grainedit.com/category/off-our-shelves/ "http://grainedit.com/category/off-our-shelves/")

enjoy!  
dave
